name: Shaders Project
description:
This project is a small game in which you navigate through a maze to find the marble. Use the power ups found in the maze to overcome otherwise impassable obstacles.

  • Use the phase power up to pass through certain walls.
  • Use the bubble power up to jump great heights.
  • Use the metal power up to walk underwater.

This project was developed in April 2019 for my second year Graphics module. For this project, I researched and wrote multiple shaders including:

  • ToonWater – seen on the surface of the water.
  • TransparentMultiPass – seen on Ethan when he uses the phase power up.
  • WorldReflect – seen on Ethan when he uses the metal power up.
  • Bubble – seen on Ethan when he uses the bubble power up.
  • Iridescent – seen on the marble.

The project is designed to showcase these shaders in a narrative friendly manner. 

This project is still being polished. Plans for fixes can be found on my webpage, here.

Thank you for looking at my project!
